## Vectors lists and data frames

```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)

class(vec_1)

# what type of variable does it store?:
typeof(vec_1)

vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[[3]]
vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[[1]]
vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]

vec_1_e5to7

vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", location = "Rincon", swell = "south")

class(vec_2)
typeof(vec_2)

vec_2[2]
vec_2["location"]

length(vec_2)

vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
```

## Create a data frame in R, index

```{r}
df_1 <- data.frame(list(
  region = c("A", "B", "A", "D"),
  species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray whale"),
  count = c(12, 2, 36, 6)))

df_1

class(df_1)
class(df_1$species)
# alternatively:
class(df_1[,1])

max_count <- df_1[3, 3] # row 3, column 3
max_count
```
